about: I am an experienced software developer with a strong background in building scalable and user-friendly web applications. My passion lies in crafting robust solutions that not only meet business requirements but also provide seamless experiences for end users. I thrive in collaborative environments and enjoy working closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software products. With expertise in both frontend and backend development, I bring a holistic approach to solving complex problems and continuously strive to improve my skills through learning and hands-on practice.

experience.description: Lead developer on multiple projects, focusing on frontend and backend integration.
Worked on client websites and internal tools development.
Developed and maintained scalable APIs and responsive UI components using React and Node.js. Collaborated with UX designers to implement accessible and mobile-first interfaces.
Built custom WordPress themes and plugins for small businesses. Provided SEO optimization and ongoing maintenance services while managing multiple clients simultaneously.
